The socket namespace contains an implementation independent interface to all socket communication within the framework.


Detailed Description

/namespace sevent::endiansafe

A endianess framework where we assume one will send data in pairs of (endianess,data), and decode it if needed on the receiving side.

This appoach saves a lot of resoures compared to frameworks where data is encoded in one endian, and always encoded it, even if both sides use the same endianess.
